title: 078 - Making A Murderer: Bill McComas
description: On today's show, the guys discuss Bill's new mustache and how it gives him a striking resemblance to about 4 or 5 serial killers, their thoughts on a couple of new shows they've been watching including Yellowstone and Cobra Kai, Mitt's day trading escapades that have him feeling like the Wolf of Wall Street, the current toxicity levels in the office, and much more. Don't forget to send in your questions and submissions to the Pod FOD @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram, and subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow for all the PMI content. We appreciate you for listening. Enjoy.
